languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает и долго обдумывает ваши слова в безмолвной борьбе с собой. Но в итоге трясет головой:{/n} "Нет. Не терплю, элантах. Но то, что ты помнишь об этом и уважаешь мои чувства, для меня значит многое".

{n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает и долго обдумывает ваши слова в безмолвной борьбе с собой. Но в итоге трясет головой:{/n} "Нет. Не терплю, элантах. Но то, что ты помнишь об этом и уважаешь мои чувства, для меня значит многое".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yurliet shudders and ponders you words for a long while in the quiet battle with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No, I can't stand them, elantach. But the fact that you do remember it and respect my feelings means a lot to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yurliet shudders and ponders you words for a long while in the quiet battle with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No, I can't stand them, elantach. But the fact that you do remember it and respect my feelings means a lot to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}听到你的话，伊莉耶特颤抖着陷入了沉思，似乎内心在做着斗争。过了一会儿，她摇了摇头。{/n}“是啊，我确实无法忍受，外界人。不过，我感谢你还记得我的习惯，尊重我的感受。这对我来说很重要。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到你的话，伊莉耶特颤抖着陷入了沉思，似乎内心在做着斗争。过了一会儿，她摇了摇头。{/n}“是啊，我确实无法忍受，外界人。不过，我感谢你还记得我的习惯，尊重我的感受。这对我来说很重要。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se estremece y sopesa tus palabras durante un largo rato mientras se debate consigo misma en silencio. Pero luego menea la cabeza.{/n} «No. No lo puedo soportar, elantach. Pero el hecho de que lo recuerdes y respetes mis sentimientos significa mucho para mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se estremece y sopesa tus palabras durante un largo rato mientras se debate consigo misma en silencio. Pero luego menea la cabeza.{/n} «No. No lo puedo soportar, elantach. Pero el hecho de que lo recuerdes y respetes mis sentimientos significa mucho para mí».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet frémit et réfléchit à vos paroles durant quelques instants, en proie à un débat intérieur. Elle finit par secouer la tête.{/n} « Non, je ne pourrais pas le supporter, elantach. Mais le fait que vous vous souveniez de cela et preniez en compte mes sentiments compte beaucoup à mes yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet frémit et réfléchit à vos paroles durant quelques instants, en proie à un débat intérieur. Elle finit par secouer la tête.{/n} « Non, je ne pourrais pas le supporter, elantach. Mais le fait que vous vous souveniez de cela et preniez en compte mes sentiments compte beaucoup à mes yeux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schaudert und denkt lange über deine Worte nach, während sie stumm mit sich ringt. Dann jedoch schüttelt sie den Kopf.{/n} "Nein. Ich ertrage sie wirklich nicht, Elantach. Aber dass Ihr Euch daran erinnert und meine Gefühle respektiert, bedeutet mir sehr viel."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schaudert und denkt lange über deine Worte nach, während sie stumm mit sich ringt. Dann jedoch schüttelt sie den Kopf.{/n} "Nein. Ich ertrage sie wirklich nicht, Elantach. Aber dass Ihr Euch daran erinnert und meine Gefühle respektiert, bedeutet mir sehr viel."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは身震いし、自分自身と静かに闘う中で、あなたの言葉について長い間考えていた。{/n}「いや、耐えられないんだ、エランタ。だが、お前がこのことを覚えていてくれること、そして我の気持ちを尊重してくれることには大きな意味がある」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは身震いし、自分自身と静かに闘う中で、あなたの言葉について長い間考えていた。{/n}「いや、耐えられないんだ、エランタ。だが、お前がこのことを覚えていてくれること、そして我の気持ちを尊重してくれることには大きな意味がある」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}İrkilen Yrliet, sanki kendisiyle savaşırcasına sözlerini bir süre düşünüyor. Sonra başını sallıyor.{/n} "Evet, katlanamıyorum elantach. Fakat bunu hatırlamış olman ve duygularıma saygı göstermen çok değerli."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet shudders and ponders your words for a long while as she battles silently with herself. But then she shakes her head.{/n} "No. I cannot bear it, elantach. But the fact that you remember this and respect my feelings means a great deal to me."
